analysis.description:
LowcarbonToken.mint (/unique_chucks/10/0xc4581e49d306f4df9e672ac9b31a7b2da5fe1d5b.sol#208-228) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- last_mint == 0
	- diffHours == 0

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/10/0xc4581e49d306f4df9e672ac9b31a7b2da5fe1d5b.sol:
	Contract LowcarbonToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/10/0xc4581e49d306f4df9e672ac9b31a7b2da5fe1d5b.sol#189)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0xc4581e49d306f4df9e672ac9b31a7b2da5fe1d5b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/10/0xc4581e49d306f4df9e672ac9b31a7b2da5fe1d5b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/10/0xc4581e49d306f4df9e672ac9b31a7b2da5fe1d5b.sol#61-63) is not in mixedCase
